body_html: another +1 for windows with GPU support. Although TF seemed a better option, I had to switch to Theano as a result for lack of GPU support on windows. It will be nice if there is a mention on TF's roadmap as to whether support is going to be available in future releases, as it will help with loads of researchers decision making.
